original_text: And they threw him out of the vineyard and killed him. What then will the owner of the vineyard do to them?
korean_text: 포도원 밖에 내쫓아 죽였느니라 그런즉 포도원 주인이 이 사람들을 어떻게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: And they threw him out of the vineyard
What then will the owner of the vineyard do to them?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 포도원 주인이 그들에게 무엇을 하겠습니까?
